content:
Lloyd McKenzie changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Discussion of the Profiling Academy: Sharing of knowledge, questions, ideas/suggestions for improvement, discussions of best-practices and so on.

  • New description:

Discussion of the Profiling Academy: Sharing of knowledge, questions, ideas/suggestions for improvement, discussions of best-practices and so on. This stream is retained for archival purposes only
Lloyd McKenzie renamed stream Profiling Academy to Profiling Academy - archived.
